messages.content:
Categorize this IT Ticket:

check extensions for leavers last months thursday october pm re extensions users hello please advised found available extensions ranges rest assigned best regards analyst community builder ext hub thursday october pm re extensions users hello please find out where other extensions gone thank october re extensions users hello found document ranges allocated per location total extensions has around employees happens rest extensions assume allocated meeting rooms around least digits extensions extensions review part opinion allocate extensions ranges range range range range range range range range thank senior engineer thursday october re extensions users importance high hello everyone unfortunately explicit mention five digits extension pm double checked please let how extensions available per location understand none left about other ones thank october re extensions users hello thank flagging let leftover assigned leaver extensions solve issue reserved ones meantime pm upgrade switch digit extensions included thank october re extensions users hello strange regarding extensions reached limit recommend extensions allocated leavers also found information none allocable reserve future growth extensions thank senior engineer wednesday october pm extensions users hello starter joins assign him extension moment more available extensions please provide range extensions kind regards analyst ext hub wednesday october re extensions users hello clear needs provide more details thank senior engineer friday october pm extensions users hello please advised has logged assigned queue kind regards analyst ext hub
